citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30 am on
07/14/2014.
Talked to licensee, but they were not available for inspection.
Additional Inspectors
Leisner Erika, Veterinary Medical Officer
